html.description: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language. It is the foundation for almost every website on the internet.

css.description: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheet. It is used to define styles for HTML elements.

aria.description: ARIA stands for Accessible Rich Internet Applications. This standard is used to augment other technologies such as HTML and improve accessibility.

svg.description: SVG stands for Scalable Vector Graphics and is used across the web.
